contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 24, 1912 D Newark Contest
Newark Contest 0 Other
newark-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Apollo
Sconce Hills, Farndon Road, Newark 1st prize £5 and cup, 2nd £3, 3rd £2. Best cornet, flugal, horn, euphonium and baritone - Ruston's, best trombone - Clayton Silver. March contest 1st Leicester Imperial, 2nd Clayton Silver. 4 bands competed. Another newspaper report implies it was an own choice contest with "all the bands except one choosing Balfe's Maritana" Promoted by Abbott's Boiler Works Band.
Oct. 24, 2012, 4:35 p.m. Sept. 28, 2018, 2:48 p.m.
1 Lincoln Ruston's Silver E. Bausor
2 Clayton Subscription Tom Casson
3 Kirby Imperial Charles Harry Baker
4 Lincoln City Band H. Clifton
